0c5fa4f8f2afe45a89e05afbbc9f6987 (02:47): unfo: not really as the database is not part of the package, but i found it finally in /var/lib/ldap

4ece1a036f78e2539b1ab3ed028c21d4 (02:47): using rsync for a backup'ing system, what happens if i "cut" the transfer ? the file are uploaded again because not is complete or just skipped ?
8b5a676617b109dd2d9d7f57f1c141a4 (02:48): Thanatermesis: nothing will happen, it just stops. they'll be fixed.
e74fb43749ed1ad47c15352f98f43a4a (02:48): CAiRO: maybe there's a way to get a list of registered config-files for a package, I dunno how.
894f0fb10b4c2e2607f2275138222ea9 (02:48): Thanatermesis: uploaded again. they aren't moved into place until they are transferred completely
4ece1a036f78e2539b1ab3ed028c21d4 (02:48): aha, perfect :)
d21114eeb5befae30788053947b308b7 (02:50): if i wish to add skin and defult config to the mplayer  bakeg how to do that ?
d21114eeb5befae30788053947b308b7 (02:50): i use DEB_BUILD_OPTIONS="--prefix=/usr --confdir=/etc/mplayer --enable-runtime-cpudetection --enable-gui" fakeroot debian/rules binary

44b6cd60d8fac6f0c170f76bc165e756 (03:14): sbk: well, there's /proc/net/dev, but that's raw data per-interface
8b48b29cde2b6b5074ab991e5e34c4c1 (03:15): Shadowcat: ah, thanks
894f0fb10b4c2e2607f2275138222ea9 (03:15): swiceje: that is what? a redhat kernel?

894f0fb10b4c2e2607f2275138222ea9 (03:15): swiceje: what does "dpkg -l libc6 | tail -1" say?
44b6cd60d8fac6f0c170f76bc165e756 (03:15): sbk: ftp://ftp.dlitz.net/pub/dlitz/scripts/loadmon/0.1/loadmon
44b6cd60d8fac6f0c170f76bc165e756 (03:15): sbk: if you want to display transmission rates in a nice format
